name: Raspberry Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing
author: OldFashionedFoodie
summary: Sick and tired of trying bottle after bottle of dressing, and not finding anything that came even close to my favorite restaurant-inspired salad, this recipe allows me to have simple, delicious salad anytime, with only a few simple ingredients. Tastes amazing on salad with fruit (apples are my favorite), or even as a bread dip!
directions: Combine oil, raspberry balsamic vinegar, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, mustard, and garlic in a sealable jar
Seal the jar and shake vigorously until dressing is well-combined
Refrigerate until flavors combine, at least 1 hour
